boofcv.abst.feature.detect.interest

Class ConfigFastHessian

  • java.lang.Object
    • boofcv.abst.feature.detect.interest.ConfigFastHessian
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    boofcv.struct.Configuration, java.io.Serializable

    public class ConfigFastHessian
extends java.lang.Object
implements boofcv.struct.Configuration
    Configuration for FastHessianFeatureDetector plus feature extractor.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • detectThreshold

        public float detectThreshold
        Minimum feature intensity. Image dependent. Start tuning at 1.

      • extractRadius

        public int extractRadius
        Radius used for non-max-suppression. Typically 1 or 2.

      • maxFeaturesPerScale

        public int maxFeaturesPerScale
        Maximum number of features that non-maximum suppression (NMS) can return from each scale. Features with higher intensity scores are given preference. If ≤ 0 NMS will return all features it finds.

      • initialSampleSize

        public int initialSampleSize
        How often pixels are sampled in the first octave. Typically 1 or 2.

      • initialSize

        public int initialSize
        Typically 9.

      • numberScalesPerOctave

        public int numberScalesPerOctave
        Typically 4.

      • numberOfOctaves

        public int numberOfOctaves
        Typically 4.

      • scaleStepSize

        public int scaleStepSize
        Increment between kernel sizes as it goes up in scale. In some data sets, increasing this value beyound the default value results in an improvement in stability. Default 6

    • Constructor Detail
